body: Prerequisite: Outsider (native) with ties to the Plane of Earth, construct type, or half-construct subtype; Benefit: Members of this race have reflective, crystalline skin that grants them a +2 racial bonus to AC against rays. Once per day, they can deflect a single ray attack targeted at them as if they were using the Deflect Arrows feat.
name: Crystalline Form
